New Records: 20-year-old Jackson Chourio became the youngest player to hit a leadoff homer in the postseason
Garrett Mitchell hit a first-pitch curveball for a 390-foot home run
Key Match Events: Blake Perkins singled and William Contreras grounded into a double play
Willy Adames kept the eighth inning going with a single
Garrett Mitchell hit a drive just over the wall in right-center, a 390-foot shot that sent the American Family Field crowd into a frenzy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams will play a decisive Game 3 on Thursday night
Milwaukee had been 0-26 in the postseason when trailing going into the eighth inning
Jackson Chourio is the second-youngest player to homer twice in a postseason game
Milwaukee's loss due to a critical mistake around first base
The Mets took the lead in the second inning after a Brewers pitcher again made a critical mistake around first base
